text: @Jacob_Rees_Mogg Shame on you. I thought you had some values based on a faith shared by many. Sorry, you've let your party and your faith down. What's more, you all need to read the Coronavirus regs. I did. He broke regulations laid down in a statutory instrument. The truth will out.
